com.dukascopy.api

Interface IChartPanel

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IChart, IIndicatorPanel

    public interface IChartPanel
    Chart panel container for objects of corresponding type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(IChartObject chartObject)
      Adds object of IChartObject type to current panel.
      IChartPanel add(IIndicator indicator)
      Adds indicator to the current panel.
      IChartPanel add(IIndicator indicator, java.lang.Object[] optParams)
      Adds indicator to the current panel by specifying initial optional parameters values If optParams equals to null - default ones will be taken instead
      IChartPanel add(IIndicator indicator, java.lang.Object[] optParams, java.awt.Color[] outputColors, OutputParameterInfo.DrawingStyle[] outputDrawingStyles, int[] outputWidths)
      Adds indicator to the current panel by specifying initial optional parameters values, curves colors, drawing styles and line widths If output params are nulls - default ones will be taken instead
      void addMouseListener(boolean asynchronous, IChartPanelMouseListener chartMouseListener)
      Adds the specified mouse listener to receive mouse events from this chart panel.
      IChartObject get(java.lang.String chartObjectKey)
      Returns IChartObject instance by key if any exist on this panel.
      java.util.List<IChartObject> getAll()
      Returns all graphical objects on this panel.
      java.util.List<IIndicatorAppearanceInfo> getIndicatorApperanceInfos()
      Returns indicator appearance information on the chart panel
      java.util.List<IIndicator> getIndicators()
      Returns all indicators on the chart panel.
      double getMaxPrice()
      Returns maximal value of price scale
      double getMinPrice()
      Returns minimal value of price scale
      java.util.List<IChartPanelMouseListener> getMouseListeners()
      Returns an array of all the mouse listeners registered on this component.
      void remove(IChartObject chartObject)
      Deletes specified graphical object from this panel.
      IChartObject remove(java.lang.String chartObjectKey)
      Deletes graphical object from this panel by key.
      void removeAll()
      Removes all graphical objects from this panel.
      void removeIndicator(IIndicator indicator)
      Remove specified indicator from this panel.
      void removeMouseListener(IChartPanelMouseListener chartMouseListener)
      Removes the specified mouse listener so that it no longer receives mouse events from this component.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(IChartObject chartObject)
        Adds object of IChartObject type to current panel. Please note that only one instance of object can be added per chart.
        Parameters:
        chartObject - - instance of IChartObject super type.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if object is already present on chart.

      • add

        IChartPanel add(IIndicator indicator)
        Adds indicator to the current panel.
        Parameters:
        indicator - as IIndicator
        Returns:
        IChartPanel instance where indicator is put on.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - trying to apply to main panel indicator designed for sub panel.

      • add

        IChartPanel add(IIndicator indicator,
              java.lang.Object[] optParams)
        Adds indicator to the current panel by specifying initial optional parameters values If optParams equals to null - default ones will be taken instead
        Parameters:
        indicator - as IIndicator
        optParams - as Object[]
        Returns:
        IChartPanel instance where indicator is put on.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - trying to apply indicator designed for main panel to sub panel and vice versa.

      • add

        IChartPanel add(IIndicator indicator,
              java.lang.Object[] optParams,
              java.awt.Color[] outputColors,
              OutputParameterInfo.DrawingStyle[] outputDrawingStyles,
              int[] outputWidths)
        Adds indicator to the current panel by specifying initial optional parameters values, curves colors, drawing styles and line widths If output params are nulls - default ones will be taken instead
        Parameters:
        indicator - as IIndicator
        optParams - as Object[]
        outputColors - as Color[]
        outputDrawingStyles - as DrawingStyle[]
        outputWidths - as int[]
        Returns:
        IChartPanel instance where indicator is put on.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - trying to apply indicator designed for main panel to sub panel and vice versa.

        Returns:
        indicator appearance information on the chart panel

      • get

        IChartObject get(java.lang.String chartObjectKey)
        Returns IChartObject instance by key if any exist on this panel.
        Parameters:
        chartObjectKey - unique id
        Returns:
        IChartObject or null if no object was found by specified key

      • getAll

        java.util.List<IChartObject> getAll()
        Returns all graphical objects on this panel.
        Returns:
        list of all graphical objects on the chart

        Returns:

        Returns maximal value of price scale
        Returns:
        maximal value of the vertical scale

        Remove specified indicator from this panel.
        Parameters:

        Deletes specified graphical object from this panel.
        Parameters:

      • removeAll

        void removeAll()
        Removes all graphical objects from this panel.

      • addMouseListener

        void addMouseListener(boolean asynchronous,
                    IChartPanelMouseListener chartMouseListener)
        Adds the specified mouse listener to receive mouse events from this chart panel. If chartMouseListener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
        Parameters:
        asynchronous - if true listener will be triggered in AWT thread asynchronously with strategy thread, otherwise will be synchronized. Use false as default if not sure.
        chartMouseListener - the mouse listener
        See Also:
        removeMouseListener(com.dukascopy.api.chart.mouse.IChartPanelMouseListener), getMouseListeners()

      • removeMouseListener

        void removeMouseListener(IChartPanelMouseListener chartMouseListener)
        Removes the specified mouse listener so that it no longer receives mouse events from this component. This method performs no function, nor does it throw an exception, if the listener specified by the argument was not previously added to this component. If chartMouseListener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
        Parameters:
        chartMouseListener - the mouse listener
        See Also:
        addMouseListener(boolean, com.dukascopy.api.chart.mouse.IChartPanelMouseListener), getMouseListeners()

      • getMouseListeners

        java.util.List<IChartPanelMouseListener> getMouseListeners()
        Returns an array of all the mouse listeners registered on this component.
        Returns:
        all of this component's MouseListeners or an empty array if no mouse listeners are currently registered
        See Also:
        addMouseListener(boolean, com.dukascopy.api.chart.mouse.IChartPanelMouseListener), removeMouseListener(com.dukascopy.api.chart.mouse.IChartPanelMouseListener)
